Name: The Polynesian Cultural Center VR Experience
About the game: Have you ever wondered what it's like to spend the day at the Polynesian Cultural Center - Hawaii's #1 paid attraction - on the North Shore of Oahu? Experience each of the Center's amazing Polynesian villages, the incredible evening show Ha: Breath of Life, our beautiful mid-day canoe show Huki!, and our delightful Ali'i Luau Dinner Show in full 3D/360 VR. This experience will give you just a taste of what you will find when you visit the Polynesian Cultural Center on your next trip to the beautiful island of Oahu.
